title: Adib Mazloom
text:
Welcome to my personal portfolio.
I am an Aerospace Engineer and MBA Candidate passionate about technical innovation, data-driven decision making, and strategic engineering solutions.

title: Engineering Analytics
text:
This section highlights key technical projects demonstrating my skills in aerospace engineering, data analysis, and system modeling.




Modeled thermal and structural performance for high-speed flight vehicles.
Utilized ANSYS and MATLAB for simulations and optimization studies.
Conducted FEA (Finite Element Analysis) to optimize airframe designs under thermal loads.






Built R scripts to perform statistical analysis and forecasting for complex engineering projects.
Applied data visualization to detect trends and inform system optimization strategies.
Delivered business intelligence insights into aerospace R&D project feasibility.

title: MBA Projects
text:
Welcome to the MBA Projects section of my portfolio.




Developed a diversified investment portfolio using real-world market data.
Allocated assets across sectors including Technology, Healthcare, Energy, and Financials.
Achieved strong returns with an emphasis on risk management and sector balancing.
Included detailed monthly reports and performance tracking.
Tools used: Excel, RStudio, Power BI.






Conducted detailed analysis of supply chain inefficiencies for manufacturing optimization.
Proposed strategic solutions for production and logistics improvements.
Built dynamic models using Solver and Excel-based optimization tools.
Visualized findings through Tableau dashboards to assist executive decision-making.
